body:
Hello,


I have gone through this previous Radiance thread
<https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/hdri/2012-August/000429.html> about
running hdrgen on Linux. I would like to know if there is any latest
version of hdrgen available for 64-bit Ubuntu and if anyone can send me the
same.


Thank you.


Regards,


Sneha Jain
M.S by Research in IT in Building Science,
Center for IT in Building Science Lab,
International Institute of Information Technology,
Hyderabad-500032, India
